unit.data.boreal_brute.name: Boreal Brute
unit.data.boreal_brute.lore: Giant Yetis from the frozen lands. This is an advance force that came down to the Citadels to help fight back the invaders before they reach their own homes.
unit.data.boreal_brute.combo.1: <style="status">Cancel</style> <style="value">1</style> Enemy's Attacks and <style="value">Reduce</style> its Armor by <style="value">3</style>
unit.data.boreal_brute.description.visua: Furry looking creature, akin to a yeti. With long black horns and expressionless black eyes. The fur his icy white and spikes of blue ice are seen in the background.
